mapper.insert: INSERT INTO register_demand_quarter (store_code, demand_date, slot_time, required_units, group_id) VALUES (#{storeCode}, #{demandDate}, #{slotTime}, #{requiredUnits}, #{groupId}) ON CONFLICT (store_code, demand_date, slot_time) DO UPDATE SET required_units = EXCLUDED.required_units, group_id = EXCLUDED.group_id
